original_title: エノケンのどんぐり頓兵衛
overview: Enoken plays a frog-oil-hawking conman whose claims to martial prowess land him in hot water with the local samurai gentry - but not before he falls in love with exactly the wrong girl. Another musical comedy period film quick on the heels of the earlier Kondo Isami.
title: Enoken's Donguri Tonbei
